description: This file contains utility functions for system management tasks such as retrieving system uptime, IP address, MAC address, and handling core dumps and reboot logging in a shell script. It also includes configuration loading and environment setup commands.

methods.name: Timestamp
methods.description: Returns the current date and time in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS' format.

methods.name: resetRebootFlag
methods.description: Logs a reboot message with timestamp, resets a reboot flag file, and logs the reason message.

methods.name: Uptime
methods.description: Returns the system uptime in seconds.

methods.name: getIPAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the eSTB IP address, handling IPv6 and IPv4 formats depending on the presence of an IPv6 indicator file.

methods.name: getMacAddress
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the eSTB interface.

methods.name: getMacAddressOnly
methods.description: Retrieves the MAC address of the eSTB interface in a format without colons.

methods.name: waitForDumpCompletion
methods.description: Waits until core dump creation is complete or timeout occurs.

methods.name: dumpInProcess
methods.description: Checks if core dump files are currently being generated.

methods.name: haveCoreToUpload
methods.description: Checks if there are core dump files available for upload.
